isis.stitle: 10 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RTLO SERIES - INSTALL - AUXILIARY SECTION WITH TAPERED BEARINGS

svcproc.title: AUXILIARY SECTION WITH TAPERED BEARINGS
svcproc.para: There are different bolt lengths; install in the correct location.
Auxiliary sections can be installed either with the transmission in the horizontal position or the vertical position.
To install in the vertical position, the clutch housing must be installed.
To install the auxiliary section in the horizontal position.

step1.para: Position a new gasket on the transmission mounting surface ( Figure 236).

figure.caption: Figure 236. Auxiliary Section With Tapered Bearings

step1.para: Attach an auxiliary section hanger bracket to the auxiliary section top ( Figure 236).
Attach a lifting chain to the auxiliary section hanger bracket ( Figure 236).
Position the auxiliary section on the two (2) dowel pins ( Figure 236).
Slide the auxiliary section on until the hanger bracket contacts the front section back.
Remove the auxiliary section hanger bracket.
Slide the auxiliary section the rest of the way into position.
Apply Eaton/Fuller Sealant #71205 or Loctite 242 to the retaining bolts ( Figure 237).

figure.caption: Figure 237. Apply Sealant To Retaining Bolts

step1.para: Install the retaining bolts; tighten to 35 to 45 ft-lbs. (47 to 61 N•m) of torque.
To finish installation, refer to 6.12., Shimming Procedure for Tapered Bearings.

svcproc.para: To install the auxiliary section in the vertical position.

step1.para: With blocks under the clutch housing to prevent input shaft damage, place the transmission in the vertical position, clutch housing down ( Figure 238).

figure.caption: Figure 238. New Gasket On Transmission Mounting Surface

step1.para: Position a new gasket on the transmission mounting surface ( Figure 238).
Install a steel bar through the yoke ( Figure 238).
Attach a lifting chain to the steel bar ( Figure 238).
Position the auxiliary section over the two (2) dowel pins ( Figure 238).
Slide the auxiliary section down the dowels.
Apply Eaton/Fuller Sealant #71205 or Loctite 242 to the retaining bolts.
Install the retaining bolts; tighten to 35 to 45 ft-lbs. (47 to 61 N•m) of torque ( Figure 239).
Remove the steel bar and chain.
To finish installation, refer to SHIMMING PROCEDURE FOR TAPERED BEARINGS.
